short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that automatically collects bonus channel points on Twitch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can work on multiple Twitch channels at the same time.
The green number indicates the amount of bonuses collected.
You can turn off the extension by clicking on it.
Don't forget to refresh your browser after the installation.
